customer_name: Carolyns Country Cousins L L C
site_name: CAROLYNS COUNTRY COUSINS L L C

citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 1545 hrs on
02/22/2016.
The facility was closed for the season and no one was present. The inspector left a voicemail with the licensee and
tried to locate the licensee at home but was unsuccessful.
